<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stumbling Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=6005) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 122 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Stumbling Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5982); Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

**Requirements**
You are in Stumbling Stance.

</column>

---

You lash out confusingly, with what seems to be a weak move, but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe. When you use [Flurry of Blows](/Actions.aspx?ID=2817), you can attempt a check to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390) as a free action just before the first Strike. On a success, instead of making the target [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against your next attack, they become off-guard against both attacks from the Flurry of Blows.
name: Stumbling Feint
